snippet: Staring at a computer or smartphone screen can cause a variety of vision problems. Special-purpose glasses can help bring the screens into sharp focus.
abstract: Staring at a computer or smartphone screen can cause a variety of vision problems; special-purpose glasses can help bring the screens into sharp focus; 31 percent of people over 18 spend at least five hours a day on a computer, tablet or smartphone.
